Articles.Content:
The challenge is as follows:

Stage one is relatively easy: Launch and complete at least one orbit of Kearth; no altitude requirement. Simple enough.

Stage two takes the limelight; after completing at least one orbit around the planet, you must land within visual range of the KSP Space Center (bonus points for landing on the green of the facility), on solid ground, WITHOUT USING A PARACHUTE. Your ship (at least the landed part) must remain intact and all crew members alive when you land.

You can use vanilla, CaptainSlug's lander legs, Quabit's parts, Wobbly rockets and Doughnut research parts.
